    • Method Detail

      • returnEncryptedFile

        public java.io.File returnEncryptedFile(java.io.File file2Encrypt,
                               java.lang.String outputFilePath,
                               java.lang.String keyPath)
        This method returns the encrypted file you can pass in the parameters. The File returns will be stored at the position you can pass, too.
        Parameters:
        file2Encrypt - - File, you want to encrypt
        outputFilePath - - File- Location of the encrypted File
        keyPath - - Path of the Key (if the path is null it will use the default- Path
        Returns:
        - The Encrypted File

      • returnEncryptedString

        public java.lang.String returnEncryptedString(java.lang.String message,
                                     java.lang.String keyPath)
        This Method will be returns the encrypted String of the String you can pass in the parameters.
        Parameters:
        message - - The String you want to encrypt
        keyPath - - Path of the Key (if the path is null it will use the default- Path
        Returns:
        - The Encrypted String
